channel.title: Travel on Hina Sakazaki
channel.description: Recent content in Travel on Hina Sakazaki

item.title: 2 Week Vacation to Tokyo & Seoul
item.description: Here’s my first travel post! I went on a two week trip with 2 of my buddies and my fiance, Chris to Tokyo and Seoul. Our flight was through Korean Air - SFO -> ICN -> NRT, then HND -> GMP, and finally, ICN -> SFO. Table of Contents Day 1: Arrive, Teppan Baby Day 2: Pumpkin Muffin and Family Day 3: Meiji Jinguu, Ramen, Shopping Yakitori Day 4: Tsukiji, Ginza Coffee
